dcterms:creator: M. Hausknecht
P. Stone
dcterms:description: A simulation environment for scoring goals in a 2D soccer game, used to validate the efficiency and effectiveness of the proposed P-DQN method.
dcterms:title: RoboCup Soccer

dcterms:creator: M. Hausknecht
P. Stone
dcterms:description: A popular mobile Multiplayer Online Battle Arena (MOBA) game in which players control heroes to destroy the opposing team's base, used to evaluate the proposed P-DQN method in a one-versus-one mode.
dcterms:title: King of Glory (KOG)

dcterms:creator: M. Hausknecht
P. Stone
dcterms:description: An abstraction of the full RoboCup 2D game, focusing on scoring goals without a goalie, used to validate the proposed P-DQN method.
dcterms:title: Half Field Offense (HFO)

dcterms:creator: V. Mnih
K. Kavukcuoglu
D. Silver
A. Graves
I. Antonoglou
D. Wierstra
M. Riedmiller
dcterms:description: A collection of video games used to evaluate reinforcement learning algorithms, particularly for training agents to play various Atari games.
dcterms:title: Atari

dcterms:creator: D. Silver
A. Huang
C. J. Maddison
A. Guez
L. Sifre
G. Van Den Driessche
J. Schrittwieser
I. Antonoglou
V. Panneershelvam
M. Lanctot
dcterms:description: A board game played with black and white stones, where the objective is to surround more territory than the opponent, used to demonstrate the capabilities of deep reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Go Game
